long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Chat with your Canvas courses using AI. Get help on assignments, studying, or simply just having a way to talk about classes. Chat about grades, upcoming assignments, announcements and more.

This is the extension to support the AI Tutor. The extension adds a sidebar to access AI chat, and uses the Canvas LMS to manage logging in and out. This way no account is required to sign in.
